titleStmt.title: A proper new balade expressyng the fames, concerning a warning to al London dames to the tune of the blacke Almaine.
titleStmt.author: Peele, Steven.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at S. Katherins by Alexander Lacie for Henrie Kyrkham, dwellyng at the middle north dore of S. Paules church,

notesStmt.note: A song - "You London dames, whose passyng fames".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the middle north dore of S. Paules church
